pages.title: Personal Rockets
pages.text: Personal rockets are the first manned spacecraft you'll build. They allow a single player to travel to space, though they are one-way vessels.$(br2)Before launching a personal rocket, ensure you are wearing a complete Space Suit to survive the harsh vacuum of space.

pages.title: Using Personal Rockets
pages.text: 1. Craft a single $(thing)Landing Pad$() and place it$(br)2. Right-click the Landing Pad with a Personal Rocket$(br)3. Right-click the Personal Rocket to board it$(br)4. Hold SPACE to launch$(br2)$(warning)Important: Personal rockets require Landing Pads, not Launch Rails!

pages.title: Space Survival
pages.text: Once in space, you'll need to:$(br)1. Establish a space station with Life Support$(br)2. Setup power generation$(br)3. Build a return method (Teleporter)$(br2)Remember that personal rockets are disposable and cannot be used to return to Earth. Plan your journey carefully!
